Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class PlayerBoard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.PlayerBoard
public class PlayerBoard extends Object
Manage the entrance, the dining room and the towers of a player.

    • addTowers

      public void addTowers(int towersAdd)
      AddTowers add towers to the playerBoard
      Parameters:
      towersAdd - number of towers to add at once

    • removeTowers

      public void removeTowers(int towersRemove)
      RemoveTowers remove towers from the playerBoard. If the number of towers to remove is higher than the number of tower on the playerboard it removes every tower on the playerboard
      Parameters:
      towersRemove - number of towers to remove at once

    • changeProfessor

      public void changeProfessor(Color color)
      Method changeProfessor changes the boolean for the professor's presence
      Parameters:
      color - chosen color of professor to change

    • getProfessor

      public Boolean getProfessor(Color color)
      Method getProfessor return true if there is the professor of the chosen color on the playerBoard
      Parameters:
      color - chosen color
      Returns:
      true if there is, false else

    • moveStudentFromEntranceToDiningRoom

      public void moveStudentFromEntranceToDiningRoom(Color selectedStudent)
      Method moveStudentFromEntranceToDiningRoom moves a selected student from the entrance to the diningRoom
      Parameters:
      selectedStudent - chosen color of student to move.
